documentation.title: KoolDatePicker Class [Javascript]
documentation.metakeywords: php calendar,php ajax calendar,php date picker,php date time picker
documentation.metadescription: KoolCalendar is excellent PHP Calendar control that is features-rich, easy to integrate to web sites and simple to customize. Combining DatePicker and TimePicker, KoolCalendar offers special features like Ajax Capability, Multi-view, Quick month selection, etc. Last but not least, its revolutionary rendering using CSS sprites skyrockets its loading time.

method.samplecode:

    function OnSelect_Handle(sender,arg)
    {
        alert(arg["Date"]);
    }
    // Register for OnSelect event
    datepicker.registerEvent("OnSelect",OnSelect_Handle);
</script>
